Package com.taco.suit_lady.util

Class BindingTools

java.lang.Object
com.taco.suit_lady.util.tools.BindingsSL
public class BindingTools extends Object
Utility methods related to Properties and Bindings.

    BindingTools.RecursiveBinding<U,​V>
    Allows you to bind an ObservableValue to a dynamic Binding.

    • bindFX

      public <T> void bindFX​(javafx.beans.property.Property<T> property, javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<T> observableValue, Lock lock)
      Binds the specified Property to the specified ObservableValue, ensuring that the update process is done on the FX thread.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of Object wrapped by the specified values.
      Parameters:
      property - The Property being bound.
      observableValue - The ObservableValue the specified Property is being bound to.

    • nullCheckBinding

      public javafx.beans.binding.BooleanBinding nullCheckBinding​(javafx.beans.binding.Binding binding)
      Creates a BooleanBinding that is bound to the null status of the specified Binding.
      Parameters:
      binding - The Binding who's value is to be null-checked.
      Returns:
      The newly created BooleanBinding bound to the null status of the specified Binding.
